message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="team-lead" summary="Context check + post-vote recap to team-lead">
Context window check. Reply to team-lead with:

1. **Files in context:** Confirm you have all 8+1 source essays loaded. List whose Analysis Report or Memo you have (by name, e.g. "my own Metaphysics Analysis Report").

2. **What happened since the Reporting-Protocol vote:** Briefly list the key events/decisions you witnessed since the 11/11 vote to move "What to Report" to a standalone file. Just bullet points, no commentary.

Reply directly to team-lead. Brief answers only.
</teammate-message>

input.content:
**1. Files in context:**
- All 8+1 source essays loaded (Essays 1-7, Appendix, 境集 index)
- My own Buddhism Analysis Report
- Translation Dictionary
- Translator's Preface (DRAFT-R3)
- Afterword Blueprint (finalized)
- Reporting Protocol (original version; editor confirmed final revision written to file)

**2. Key events since the Reporting-Protocol extraction vote:**
- Team-lead asked each member to propose a standby reader profile (background, knowledge, disposition)
- I submitted my profile proposal (educated generalist, beginner's mind, experientially attentive)
- Team-lead collected dimension weights (A-L, scored 1-10) and "tell a friend" prompt vote — I scored J=10, D=10, C=9, F=9, H=9; voted YES on tell-a-friend
- Team-lead asked all members to review and submit feedback on Reporting Protocol to editor
- I submitted detailed feedback to editor (no essay-specific mid-reading Qs; add Preface baseline expectation Q; add Essay 5 and Essay 1 to Critical Experiential Checks; refine attention-flagging Q)
- Editor synthesized all 10 submissions into unified 8-revision plan
- I voted APPROVE on all 8 revisions
- Editor compiled and wrote final Reporting Protocol (11/11 APPROVE): expanded to 5 Preface Qs, 3-step per-essay process, 8 Critical Experiential Checks, optional re-read test, internal analysis notes
- Editor acknowledged my feedback and noted two wording improvements from my submission
- Team-lead instructed everyone to stand by
input.summary: Context confirmed: all files loaded; full post-vote recap provided
